item.title: Educational Data Science
item.description: We work on visualization and lesson improvement using learning and lesson data.

item.title: Elementary School Programming Education
item.description: We design and evaluate programming learning in elementary education.

item.title: For Those Who Want to Conduct Research with Us
item.description:
Introduction

The information environment surrounding school sites continues to change greatly, including the use of one GIGA device per student, the use of educational data, and elementary school programming education. From now on, not only information specialists but each of us is required to acquire basic literacy related to information and to engage in problem solving while appropriately using data and ICT. In particular, enhancing information education in elementary and secondary education is an important issue in fostering the qualities and abilities needed for everyone to use information and information technology appropriately and live richly.

item.title: Information Education
item.description: We are conducting research on ICT utilization in school settings and improving the quality of learning.

item.title: Lab Overview
item.description:
Education Data Utilization and Learning Design Lab

Our lab promotes practical research that can be applied in school settings, with three pillars: information education, elementary school programming education, and educational data science.

item.title: Publications
item.description:
This page automatically aggregates publication data registered on each member’s profile page.
Duplicates are detected by normalized paper titles, and entries with the same title are merged into one (rule: newer year is prioritized).
